title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, stream, and embed from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; sync/async wrappers for chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models (chat, generate, embeddings).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, multi-user, RAG).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fzf model picker and chat REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Kotlin friendly) with synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Lightweight npm package that exposes a simple chat interface over the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Starter repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and Chroma/FAISS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI template that connects to Ollama with session memory and model picker.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Custom n8n node that enables no-code workflows to call Ollama chat or completion endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with serde models and tokio streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs for chat and embeddings.
